Text: The Japanese cut is basically the uncut version with all the bloody parts in it that was left out in the US version. It?s a bit misleading to write Japanese cut since one might believe that the Japanese cut their films differently and therefore leaving out gore and blood. The Japanese are blood thirsty mf so this is the version to se.
